landingPage.title: App Setup Wizard
landingPage.subtitle: Welcome! This Wizard will assist you in the installation, modification, or removal of the Premium App.

installStatusPage.title: Checking Installation
installStatusPage.subtitle: Check any existing PureCloud Objects that is set up by the App
installStatusPage.p1: Before starting, let's analyze your PureCloud org for existing App configurations.
installStatusPage.p2: PureCloud objects that the App uses are prefixed with
installStatusPage.p3: This can be changed in the WizardApp class.
installStatusPage.p4: For a clean installation, it is recommended to delete the existing Objects listed below to avoid duplication. Do not delete the curent role assigned to you though until the wizard has finished.

rolesCreation.title: Create Roles
rolesCreation.subtitle: Roles are used to provide and determine access levels on the Premium App.
rolesCreation.p1: You're seeing this message because we have detected an installation order from
rolesCreation.p2: and have prepopulated this page with the requested roles.
rolesCreation.p3: This usually means there is no further need to modify anything on this page. If you wish to add additional roles, they would only contain the basic permission to access the App.

rolesAssignment.title: Assign Roles
rolesAssignment.subtitle: Assign roles to your current user.
rolesAssignment.p1: Check the roles you wish to assign to yourself.
rolesAssignment.question: Keep your current Premium App roles?
rolesAssignment.c_note: * If you're not sure, keep "Yes" checked.

groupsCreation.title: Create groups
groupsCreation.subtitle: Groups are required to filter which members will have access to specific instances of the App.
groupsCreation.p1: You're seeing this message because we have detected a default installation order from
groupsCreation.p2: We have prepopulated the page with the details but feel free to modify as you wish.

appsCreation.title: Create App Instances
appsCreation.subtitle: These is where you add instances of you app. You could specify the landing page of each instance and the groups (must be created from the wizard) who will have access to them.
appsCreation.p1: You're seeing this message because we have detected a default installation order from
appsCreation.p2: We have prepopulated the page with the details but feel free to modify as you wish.
appsCreation.p3: While modifying URL you can set macros that will automatically be filled by PureCloud. \{{pcLangTag}} and \{{pcEnvironment}}

finalizeInstallation.title: Finalize
finalizeInstallation.subtitle: Please review the items below and press Install to install the apps and configuration.
